definition: gun/firearm/rifle/spear/thing with shape or function similar to a gun/CL:支[zhi1],把[ba3],桿|杆[gan3],條|条[tiao2],枝[zhi1]/to substitute for another person in a test/to knock/classifier for rifle shots

sentences.english: The utility model relates to a flame welding gun, which belongs to the class of tools.
sentences.chinese: 本實用新型涉及一種火機焊槍，屬於工具類。

sentences.english: In addition, the commercial butane gas tank inserted directly can compose the convenient double-head welding gun.
sentences.chinese: 此外，直接接插市售丁烷氣罐還可構成簡便雙頭焊槍。

sentences.english: Use the WELDING TORCH from inventory on the chains on the casket in the middle of the room.
sentences.chinese: 使用從庫存就在屋子中間的鎖鏈棺材焊槍。

sentences.english: Two welding guns with different structure makes welding more flexible.
sentences.chinese: 兩把結構不同的焊槍，對焊接工作的方便更有利。
